author: Rhiannon Ingram
comment: Never had any problems with the app until the most recent update, now whenever I press reply to an email it crashes and I have to close the app.  I don't think the app can handle opening up an email thread, it takes a while to load the next screen then get the error message when I press to start typing. Please change it back so the reply box just expands like it used to rather than a whole new screen like I'm about forward the message, very annoying!

author: Anita Plamann
comment: All I can say is GOOGLE what happened?  You've totally dropped the ball.  This app was amazing I LOVED it but I recently went to send an email and literally all I can do is type and attach something.   I can't format any of my text and I can't even add links to my email.  If I wanted to just type and add a pic I would text message.   I am trying to send a professional email and I can't do it from my phone any more.   I checked and they did the same to the mobile version for my tablet as well.  I even logged into the regular gmail version to compose the email and the same thing!  This better just be a glitch that is fixed very VERY soon because this is just not acceptable.

author: Jeff Bedgood
comment: I love the app layout and many functions but the Spam filter is haywire. I synced my Outlook account with this app and it has placed 99% of my Outlook mail in the Spam folder. I like all my mail in one place; And I would like for this to be it. But.... It's not.

author: Fred Bloggs
comment: Good enough for Google, then its good enough for me! (Quite honestly, its a shame I had a snip in my 20's. And now that I am well am unable to father more children! I had a mind to name a baby GOOGLE!  Sigh.)

author: Evelio Garcia
comment: There's a problem when people send you other email addresses since I click on them and the app crashes. It goes white. Thanks anyways. Other than that it's perfect

author: Sonny W.
comment: Why can't you make the contents of the trash and spam folders visible so it's not necessary to open those folders to see if there is any mail in them.. Gmail is so good at identifying spam why not filter it out so we don't ever see it??? These things fixed could make it a 5* app.. Still no progress on making the spam and trash folder contents visible.

author: Nicolas Vaillancourt
comment: Perfect inbox app, but please Google, update the app's logo for Pixel 2 xl phones! It's ungly to see the minuscule logo on a white circle. Too many apps look that way btw.

author: D Pearce-DAWMAIN
comment: 2/28/18. Wish Gmail has told me about this earlier. This has the mobile ability to create folders (in Gmail, I had to use a browser to create new folders). So relieved! What a great app! Much improved! I like that you can pin emails. Way to go! Just when I was losing faith in Google (G+ has been a nightmare and poor functionality) and chronic sync problems in Gmail. I just found this app and Google Express and happy as can be! I'm trying to get over my deep despair with G+. Please fix G+. Change the team. They are giving Google a bad, bad name.

author: Allison Goodhartz
comment: As of 3/3/18, notifications are back!  Everything seems to be"back to normal". On the last 2 updates, I stopped getting notifications for my priority inbox.  No changes in settings here.  Very frustrating since I don't always think to check it on my own without the notification.    Please Fix!!  Updated again on 2/18/18 & still no notifications.

author: Heather Spaulding
comment: Up until recently,  it was great. Now it freezes when I try to open any email. I've seen other recent reviews mention the same thing. Please fix this, Google. I just configured the Microsoft Outlook app, and am using that now.  No freezes there.

author: Teemu Ojansivu
comment: Every once in awhile something is fixed and another thing breaks. Now it just doesn't notify anymore, unless opened.  Wonder what will break when and if that's fixed.

Issues have been fixed with opening email but it still groups email that I need into spam even after I change the location and only open in that section.  Update: items in spam can now be read in full if I move them to the proper folder. However, it is tedious to have to keep moving items that should not be spam. Even contacts stored in my phone get sent to spam. It is becoming a hassle.

author: heer hugo
comment: What a joke..google...cannot print from the android app???. Please use gmail or the windows desktop to print...wahaha unbelievable

author: Aimee Chan
comment: I have been using this app for over a year now, and while I do enjoy the extra functions more than Gmail, I wish there could be more active updates.  In addition, it seems to consistently get the calendar events wrong which have panicked me several times. It would be great if we could modify the event "card" info...

author: Gary Walton
comment: 1) Can we have the option to change the background. I would love a dark theme. September 2017...can we get a dark theme besides the cheesey blue and white???? 2) I'm a die hard Gmail guy so this is taking some time to get used to and Inbox is not winning. Gmail is simplistic and Inbox is trying to simplify Gmail even more. Some times over simplifying something that is already simplistic makes it well more difficult. Just integrate the best features in Inbox to Gmail. Viola!  2.9.2017- I love the mobile version.  The Desktop version is not my favorite. I'm still Gmail there.

author: Ritesh Tripathy
comment: While it seems better on the surface, some basic functions are glaringly missing - cannot star emails, no formatting! (Really!?!), automatic grouping of similar emails is iffy at best.

author: Marko Purkart
comment: It was a great app.. I don't know what Google did with last updates, but it's slow, there is no text formating..

author: Rakhee P
comment: It would be good if one of the notification drawer options would be to delete emails. At the moment you can mark emails as Done, Reply, and Snooze.

author: Rahul Yadav
comment: Only problem i face is that not all mails are shown in the notification panel.. only few appears

author: Brian Morgan
comment: I think there may be an issue with inbox and Gboard. When I reply to an email using the Gboard, the input of text slows down extremely, almost as if the application is pausing each time a key is pressed.
Please change notifications to fire only after filters have run, I constantly get notifications for emails that disappear shortly later because filter runs after notification

author: Darshan Mehta
comment: No option to move mail from trash to inbox again. Cannot star a mail. You should understand star and pin are used for different purposes.

author: Zhao Wei Liew
comment: The spam filter could be improved. It labels emails relevant to me as spam more often than I'm comfortable with.

author: Madaliso Kaunda
comment: I'm now hooked to this app more than the official gmail app. Can we have the option of changing the colour theme through to something. Maybe dark / Black

author: Eduardo Suarez
comment: No puedo ver mi cuenta outlook. Aparece una cuenta igualmente que no uso para correo sino para youtube y da error.

author: Diya Wicaksana
comment: confusing..gmail soo much better than this.

author: sheraan shabodien
comment: This app has been awesome to me, but since the most recent update I am not getting emails.

author: Cherrot Luo
comment: 体验不错

author: Yisroel Forta
comment: Love inbox, but as of late the perf has terrible

author: Frederick Albertyn
comment: Intuitive and well organised. Just takes awhile to learn.

author: Greg Paige
comment: Notifications are delayed but much better than before.

author: Konai Systems - Alan Trbizan
comment: Great app... but why it does not have widgets??

author: Yong TM
comment: CAN'T LOGIN WITH MY ACC PLS FIX!

author: k rae
comment: it's a lovely app to use, and a pleasant way to do emails.

author: Tomm Gundal
comment: Great app. More functionality all the time. A money maker!
Jitters about when replying to messages

author: Bogdan Ivanciu
comment: Great app i love it but it's missing a dark theme ;)

author: Aditya Sahu
comment: Good but I can't get notifications of mail

author: Abdulvahid IŞIK
comment: .. (accepts to use it instead of gmail) ☺
title: Neat!

author: Abhishek Singh
comment: Nice replacement for stock Gmail application.
